statements: UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = TRUE, compliance_details = '{"message": "Compliant"}' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_details = '{"message": "Incomplete"}', compliance_status = FALSE WHERE block_height = 10000;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = true, compliance_details = '{"checked_by": "John Doe"}' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = false, block_height = 10000 WHERE transaction_hash = '0xabcdef123456';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET sender_address = 'address123' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Approved', legal_entity_name = 'Company ABC' WHERE compliance_id = 2;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Approved' WHERE compliance_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, receiver_address = '0x7890123' WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE compliance_requirements SET regulation_description = 'Updated regulations for financial institutions' WHERE regulation_name = 'Financial Regulations';

UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, receiver_address = '0x34FcDj9Hb453FeDd88eC87sK72fDdA23c' WHERE sender_address = '0x1aBcEeEfD6A9334BfF6e1Cd46A12eF12B' AND transaction_time = '2022-05-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE compliance_requirements SET regulation_description = 'Updated regulation description', regulation_name = 'GDPR' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, sender_address = '0xDF8912A', receiver_address = '0xA87B12C' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500, to_address = '0xDeF1a7CE12345' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.50, from_address = '0x123abc' WHERE block_number = 100 AND transaction_id = 500;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newuser@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 500 WHERE account_id = 789;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.39, transaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 500.00, account_address = '0xNewAddress' WHERE account_id = 67890;
